articles.title: Erik ten Hag abandons Man Utd transfer plan after Sir Alex Ferguson golden rule reminder - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United may abandon their plans of signing Tottenham star striker Harry Kane after Sir Alex Ferguson previously rued dealing with the North London club
articles.content:
Manchester United will not risk a long pursuit of Tottenham striker Harry Kane with the club aware of the difficulties of negotiating with Spurs chairman Daniel Levy.
